meanings.sent1: The small seed was plantable in the fertile soil.
meanings.sent2: The garden center sold many plantable flowers for the spring season.
meanings.sent3: I never knew a pencil could be plantable until I saw the unique design.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like seeds, waiting to be plantable in the minds of others.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a floating garden seemed so plantable in my imagination.

meanings.sent1: The plantable soil was perfect for growing vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The plantable seeds were carefully selected for the garden.
meanings.sent3: The plantable pot was so cute, it made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like seeds, plantable in the hearts of those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The plantable land stretched out before us, ready for new life to grow.
